conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: extruded walls with thickness, angled/isometric camera, and roof/ceiling removed exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and readable interior volumes; clean cutaway. Slight softness/low detail on corner/wall join geometry reduces confidence in exactness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The 2D plan segment shows a specific kitchen/dining/utility/WC/core layout with distinctive boundaries; the 3D model appears to be a more generic multi-room layout and does not clearly preserve the shown room shapes, adjacencies, or proportions (e.g., kitchen/dining relationship and utility/WC placement not convincingly aligned).

interior_elements.notes: Some basic fixtures/furniture blocks are present (bath fixtures visible; minimal kitchen-like blocks), but the element set is sparse and not clearly mapped to the labeled spaces from the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render, good contrast between walls/openings, interior generally visible; minor ambiguity due to uniform materials and limited detailing.

detected_errors.description: Layout fidelity appears inconsistent: room boundaries/adjacencies in the 3D model do not clearly match the provided 2D plan segment (kitchen/dining/utility/WC core not preserved).
Door/window placement and opening sizes cannot be reliably matched to the 2D plan; several openings appear generic rather than plan-accurate.
Furniture/fixture set is simplified and does not strongly corroborate the specific room identities from the 2D plan.

summary: A true 3D cutaway was produced, but the resulting 3D layout does not convincingly preserve the specific room geometry and adjacencies of the provided 2D plan segment.
